slime_juice.name: Slime Juice
slime_juice.description: A weird slimy liquid, with a pale blue color. It could be useful for sticking things together.

slimy_crown.name: Slimy Crown
slimy_crown.description: A crown made of slime. It's very sticky.

basic_fang.name: Basic Fang
basic_fang.description: A basic fang. It's not very sharp.

warhandbook.name: War Handbook
warhandbook.description: A book about an old war between humans and monsters. It's very heavy.
